title: Mensa Otto-Behaghel-Strasse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Salad bar, Take-out, Fusion, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Giessen's University canteen offers vegan dishes on Tuesday and Thursday. Large salad bar with vegan dressings is available every day. As of Feb 2016, has 10 other locations throughout the city on different campuses. Payment with student debit cards only which are available for guests as well.
